title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - "a planet rocking..."

content.question: The image of "a planet rocking in space" (near end of the passage) suggests all of the following EXCEPT the

choices.label: swaying of the congregation to the music
cohesiveness and unity of the congregation
despair of those who are bound to earth

content.answer: despair of those who are bound to earth

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
